Package Main

Class Club

java.lang.Object
Main.GameEnvironment
Main.Club
public class Club extends GameEnvironment
Author:
Dominic Dumble, Nathan Scott Club Class extends the methods in GameEnviroment and controls the team and reserve lists. The Club Class implements methods which swap athletes on and off the team, and in and out of the reserves, as well as displaying who can and can't play in matches

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Club()
    This function initialises the Club by setting up the team and reserve lists

    • availableReserve

      public Boolean availableReserve(int stam)
      This function returns whether or not a reserve exists and if they have stamina still
      Parameters:
      stam - will always be passed in as 0. If an athlete has stamina, they can play
      Returns:
      true, false
